title: Team Sonic Racing Free Download

Team Sonic Racing combines the best elements of arcade and fast-paced competitive style racing as you face-off with friends in intense multiplayer racing. Choose from 3 distinct character types and unlock game changing vehicle customization options to suit your racing style. The Long Dark
